;The CCIE Lab examination is generally an eight hour sensible exam the place within the knowledge on troubleshooting is tested. Contenders are anticipated to diagnose and resolve issues as a part of CCIE lab exams. They need to configure and troubleshoot a sequence of compound networks as per the mentioned design. The technical difficult community assignments are normally given to the CCIE engineers.
;On clearing the CCIE Written exam the CCIE lab exam might be scheduled. Automated obtain of the passing scores of the written exams from the testing vendors takes place with a slight delay. A wait of 10 days is regular between the written exam and scheduling of the CCIE lab test.
;At the CCIE labs the engineers not solely work on the top person system however are additionally accountable for all of the units which type part of the network. The exam exams the information of the candidates on frequent protocols and technologies. The CCIE labs don? allow the utilization of any exterior material.
;A few issues required for the CCIE Lab exam:
;? Valid Cisco person account
;? The testing vendor assigns an identification quantity during the written exams, which must be retained for the lab examination
;? Date of passing the written exam
;? Passing scores of the written examination
;
;The final grading is finished by a skilled examiner. Each question is assessed in opposition to a specified principle. The proctor grades the candidates and awards points by making certain your entire specified criterion are met. The preliminary investigations are made with using automated instruments to collect data from the routers, based on which the grading is conducted.
;The CCIE Labs experiences can be found on-line within 48 hours of completion of the lab test. The candidate both passes or fails the exam. The failing report specifies the matters where the candidate is weak and wishes further efforts.
;Revaluation can also be attainable at an additional charge of US $ 250 plus the taxes applicable. It needs to be raised inside 14 days following the examination date. When there's a change in the outcomes from a fail to go the complete cash is refunded again to the candidate. The revaluation process may take upto 3 weeks time from the payment being made. A second proctor reloads the configuration onto a rack and recreates the test by finally rescoring your entire examination.
;The associated fee incurred for the CCIE Lab exams is US $ 1400 per attempt. This doesn't embrace the journey and keep charges. There might be a variation in costs due to the fluctuation in exchange fee and the assorted taxes charged.
;Funds have to be made at least 90 days prematurely to block the reservation. Payments not acquired for the exams will probably be robotically dropped off from the examination schedule. By logging in and viewing the certification status one can verify the fee due date for the exams.
;
;Points to recollect:
;? A single e mail is sent for the fee reminder
;? The exam must be rescheduled in case the examination is missed resulting from non fee
;? The lab exam date could be fastened as much as ninety days from making the cost
;? On the fee due date the bank card funds will likely be processed.
